name: Tapis Intelligence
slogan: Connecting global businesses with local intelligence
description: Tapis connects global companies, with critical local intelligence - providing them with the right data to make critical decision. From market entry, to operational management, mergers and acquisitions. Our proprietary platform enables businesses to request intelligence from our consultant community, managing every step of the process from enquiry to delivery. Currently active in 110 countries we pride ourselves in the breadth of our consultant network, and welcome qualified professionals from across the globe to join us.

team.name: Kirsten Jack
team.bioHtml: Founder @Tapis Intelligence. Founded consultancies in Syria, Liberia, China. Worked at PWC, Arthur Andersen and in 30+ countries around the world.

jobs.title: Strategic Marketing Intern
jobs.description:
We're growing fast at Tapis and are looking for a part-time intern to provide content creation and marketing support. To succeed you'll be fascinated by current affairs, politics and business, be able to author punchy articles and be happy to learn new platforms, understand marketing funnels, ideally have experience designing or managing campaigns, experience with B2B and the ability to think creatively and analyse data. 

You'll be working alongside an impressive senior management team, and with our network of analysts and consultants in 110 countries - giving you great international exposure. The role is task based and will primarily be remote - with team meetings every fortnight. We're open to applications from current students, new graduates, or people looking to diversify their skills and experience.
